a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: The child mortality rate is the share of children who die before they are five years old. This visualization shows for
each country the level child mortality rate in 1970 on the x-axis and compares it with the child mortality rate today.
Source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (via World Bank)
